texts.name: Mahyar
texts.biography: Mahyar roams the wilderness with the agility and precision of a true marksman. Raised in the shadows of oppression, her learned the ways of the bow to defend the downtrodden and strike back against tyranny.

specialty.name: Sharpshooter
specialty.description:
{Sharpshooter}

Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Sagittarii or Sharpshooter for each level attained after 5th level.
